original_text: Then Ezra the priest stood up. He said to the people, ‘You have not been faithful to your God. You have married foreign wives. You have caused the whole nation of Israel to be guilty.
korean_text: 제사장 에스라가 일어나 그들에게 이르되 너희가 범죄하여 이방 여자를 아내로 삼아 이스라엘의 죄를 더하게 하였으니

sentences.original_text: Then Ezra the priest stood up.
'You have not been faithful to your God.
You have caused the whole nation of Israel to be guilty.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 온 이스라엘 민족을 죄가 있게 만들었다.
